name: Pirate Ambush - Scavenger Crew
description: A small pirate vessel drops out of stealth, weapons hot. They're demanding your cargo.

dialogue.initial: Well, well... what do we have here? Nice ship. Shame if something happened to it.
dialogue.friendly: Smart move. Drop your cargo and we'll let you live.
dialogue.neutral: You got guts, I'll give you that. Maybe we can work something out.

outcomes.success: They take your credits and vanish into the void.
They back off, recognizing you're not worth the trouble.
You strike a deal - information for safe passage.

name: Independent Trader - The Star Runner
description: A well-worn merchant vessel hails you. Their captain seems friendly enough.

dialogue.initial: Greetings, traveler! Captain Mara of the Star Runner. Looking to trade?
dialogue.hostile: Whoa, whoa! No need for that. I'm just a trader!
dialogue.friendly: Excellent! I've got some quality goods. Take a look.
dialogue.neutral: Fair enough. If you change your mind, I'll be around for a bit.

outcomes.success: She shares rumors about nearby systems and potential opportunities.
Recent pirate activity in the dark zones. Station Alpha-7 is offering bounties.

name: Distress Signal - Stranded Survey Team
description: A weak distress beacon leads you to a damaged research vessel. Life support is failing.

dialogue.initial: *static* ...requesting assistance... life support at 12%... please respond...
dialogue.hostile: Wait... you're not here to help? You monster!
dialogue.friendly: Thank the stars! We've been drifting for three days. Can you spare supplies?
dialogue.neutral: We understand. If you can at least relay our position to the nearest station...

outcomes.success: You transfer supplies and repair their critical systems. They're deeply grateful and share valuable research data.
You provide basic supplies. It's not much, but it'll keep them alive until help arrives.
You boost their distress signal and transmit coordinates to nearby stations. They thank you profusely.

name: Military Patrol - Sector Defense Fleet
description: A military patrol vessel scans your ship. They're checking for contraband.

dialogue.initial: This is Sector Patrol Delta-Nine. Transmit your ID and manifest for inspection.
dialogue.hostile: Hostile action detected! All units, weapons free!
dialogue.friendly: Manifest clear. Proceed on your heading, citizen. Stay safe out there.
dialogue.neutral: We'll be monitoring your transponder. Don't cause trouble.

outcomes.success: They scan your ship, find nothing suspicious, and let you go.
The officer accepts the 'administrative fee' and looks the other way.
You convince them your encryption is classified research. They grudgingly accept.

name: Derelict Vessel - Unknown Origin
description: A dark, silent ship drifts through space. No life signs, no power signature. Just... waiting.

dialogue.neutral: Your sensors detect faint energy readings deep within the hull...

outcomes.success: You dock and enter carefully. The ship is ancient, pre-Surge. You find valuable artifacts and data cores.
outcomes.failure: As you breach the airlock, automated defenses activate! You barely escape with minor damage.

outcomes.success: Your scans reveal hidden compartments with rare xenotech components.
You mark the coordinates and move on. Sometimes discretion is the better part of valor.
